title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\DNSConfig
name: DNSConfig
description:
DNSConfig contains the desired set of options for configuring clusterDNS.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.DNSConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.cluster_dns
params.description: cluster_dns indicates which in-cluster DNS provider should be used.

params.name: data.cluster_dns_scope
params.description: cluster_dns_scope indicates the scope of access to cluster DNS records.

params.name: data.cluster_dns_domain
params.description: cluster_dns_domain is the suffix used for all cluster service records.
